title: Honoring a Hero
caption: A photo essay memorializing the May 26th funeral procession for San Antonio firefighter Scott Deem.

title: Loading in the casket
caption: The casket of fallen firefighter Scott Deem is placed on a fire truck at Porter Loring Mortuary.

title: A cross and dog tags
caption: A San Antonio Fire Department chaplain holds a cross and dog tags as he leaves Porter Loring Mortuary.

title: Through Alamo Plaza
caption: The funeral procession proceeds past Alamo Plaza as firefighters and members of the public lined Alamo Street to pay their final respects.

title: A blessing
caption: Catherine Leos (left) holds a sign while watching the funeral procession.

title: Unfurling the flag
caption: Firefighters unfurl a Texas flag near Alamo Plaza for the funeral procession.

title: Manuel and Esther Estrada
caption: Manuel and Esther Estrada hold up an American flag during the apparatus procession led by the San Antonio Fire Department.

title: Carried from the mortuary
caption: Attendees watch as the casket of fallen firefighter Scott Deem is carried out of Porter Loring Mortuary.

title: The procession
caption: The funeral procession for San Antonio firefighter Scott Deem heads north on U.S. Highway 281.

title: The parade arrives
caption: A fire apparatus parade made up of units from area fire departments arrives at Community Bible Church for the funeral service.

title: The Wall of Honor
caption: Denis Dermody (foreground center) of Engine 289 in New York City waits in the Wall of Honor with others at Community Bible Church.

title: A black patch
caption: Joey Guzman of Lytle Fire and Rescue places a black patch over his badge as fire trucks and personnel arrive at Community Bible Church.

title: The lineup
caption: Firefighters lineup to form a Wall of Honor in preparation for the arrival of the funeral procession.

title: Firefighters salute
caption: Firefighters salute as the body of Scott Deem arrives at Community Bible Church.

title: Arriving on foot
caption: The procession of firefighters follows the body of fallen firefighter Scott Deem as it arrives at Community Bible Church.

title: Saying goodbye
caption: Firefighters salute as the body of a fallen firefighter Scott Deem arrives at Community Bible Church.
